meanings.definition: A place where goods are bought and sold.
meanings.sent1: The local marketplaces offer a variety of fresh produce.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy visiting marketplaces to shop for unique items.
meanings.sent3: At the marketplaces, the talking fruits and vegetables made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a marketplace of ideas, bustling with creativity.
meanings.sent5: The bustling marketplaces buzzed with activity and excitement.

meanings.definition: The commercial activity of buying and selling goods and services.
meanings.sent1: Online marketplaces have made shopping more convenient for many people.
meanings.sent2: Global marketplaces play a crucial role in the economy.
meanings.sent3: The marketplace dance-off between the two companies was entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: In the marketplace of ideas, innovation is the currency of success.
meanings.sent5: The competitive marketplace drives businesses to constantly improve their products.
